Articles.Content:
Just had relatively famous 1.1.3 bug happen in 1.3. Using two Docking ports Junior, after clicking "Undock", the option simply disappeared while the ports continued to hold the two vehicles together.
No way clicking anywhere, exiting or switching anywhere would bring "Undock" option back.

I have managed to find solution and fix it, by following this guide.
To cut it short, find two entries that have "state = Disengage" and then replace one with "state = Docked (docker)", and another with "state = Docked (dockee)".

After doing this, the option was back and I could undock. Someone in the linked guide suspected KER - I have KER installed (but not KJR). This was really weird.

Here are the two versions of persistent.sfs, with problem - and with fixed problem. The docking ports which misbehaved were stock dockport Jr.

Unfixed

Fixed
